snippet: The Department of Justice said it will sue Florida to stop its push to remove what it says are ineligible voters from their rolls, while Florida said it was suing the Department of Homeland Security over the purge.
abstract: Department of Justice says that it will sue Florida to stop the state's push to remove what it claims are ineligible voters from their rolls, while Florida says it is suing the Department of Homeland Security for denying its request for access to a federal immigration database to verify that registered voters are citizens.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Justice said it will sue Florida to stop its push to remove what it says are ineligible voters from their rolls, while Florida said it was suing the Department of Homeland Security over the purge.

headline.main: Florida: Voter Purge Results in Countersuits
headline.print_headline: Florida: Voter Purge Results In Countersuits
